front.title: Things to think about when Renumbering an IPv6 network

abstract.t: This memo presents a summary of scenarios, issues for consideration and protocol features for IPv6 network renumbering, i.e. achieving the transition from the use of an existing network prefix to a new prefix in an IPv6 network. Its focus lies not in the procedure for renumbering, but as a set of "things to think about" when undertaking such a renumbering exercise.
